Package foodItemsPkg

Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
foodItemsPkg.Pizza
All Implemented Interfaces:
Deliverable
public class Pizza extends Object implements Deliverable
This class represents a Pizza order and implements the Interface called Deliverable. This class will be used to store information about a pizza order that can be printed out to the console later.

    • size_in_inches

      private int size_in_inches
      This line of code creates a variable called size_in_inches. This variable will hold the size of the pizza in inches.

    • sauce

      private String sauce
      This line of code creates a variable called sauce. This variable will hold the type of sauce on the pizza.

    • thin_crust

      private boolean thin_crust
      This line of code creates a variable called thin_crust. This variable will hold a boolean value of true or false. True will mean the pizza is thin crust, false will mean regular crust

    • ham

      private boolean ham
      This line of code creates a variable called ham. This variable will hold a boolean value of true or false. True will mean ham is added, false will mean ham is not added

  • Constructor Details

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(int size_in_inches, String sauce, boolean thin_crust)
      This line of code creates a constructor for a Pizza by chaining the other Pizza constructor and adding the thin_crust parameter. This constructor will take the size of the pizza in inches, and the sauce of the pizza
      Parameters:
      size_in_inches - the size of the pizza in inches.
      sauce - the sauce on the pizza.
      thin_crust - the crust type of the pizza. (true for thin, false for regular)

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(int size_in_inches, String sauce)
      This line if code creates a constructor for a Pizza. This constructor will take the size of the pizza in inches, and the sauce of the pizza
      Parameters:
      size_in_inches - the size of the pizza in inches.
      sauce - the sauce on the pizza.

    • getDeliveryCost

      public double getDeliveryCost()
      This method will be used to calculate the total delivery costs of the pizza. This is done by overriding the getDeliveryCost method from Deliverable interface. 12 inch pizza: 3.50 14 inch pizza: 4.75
      Specified by:
      getDeliveryCost in interface Deliverable
      Returns:
      cost the cost of the pizza.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      This method is created to override the toString method. This is done so that information about the Pizza can be printed to the console, instead of just the memory location. The toString method s overridden by providing correct formatting, then displaying the pizza name, getSize and getDeliveryCost methods.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
